articles.title: If You've Come To The Conclusion That You Are *Not* For The Streets, Here Are 32 Things To Enjoy Your Homebody Era
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The content introduces a variety of new products designed for comfort, convenience, and entertainment. These include a portable screen, cooling blankets, a USB-C cable, bamboo sleep sets, hammocks, tower fans, Bluetooth speakers, a slushie maker, inflatable pools, outdoor fans, the Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K, a personal popcorn maker, and a Yonanas soft-serve maker.  These products enhance relaxation, outdoor enjoyment, and home entertainment.

articles.title: Carolina Panthers 53-Man Roster Projection
articles.summary: KAGS introduced the KAGS app. The app allows users to stream KAGS content on their phones.

articles.title: LG Electronics Unveils AI-Powered Laundry Systems at North America's Largest Industry Fair
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: LG Electronics showcased its 'LG Professional' series, featuring AI-driven washers and dryers, at Clean Show 2025. The company also promoted its Laundry Crew app for remote monitoring and diagnostics. LG plans to expand the Professional series to North America and Europe after its initial launch in Korea.

articles.title: Samsung's Game-Changing 90:10 Split: A Multitasking Revolution?
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Samsung is beta testing its upcoming One UI 8 interface on the Galaxy Z Fold 6, introducing a new feature called the 90:10 split. This feature allows one app to occupy 90% of the screen while another occupies the remaining 10%, enabling easy switching between two large apps.

articles.title: 36 Home Items Reviewers Regret Not Buying Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new household products and cleaning solutions, including Wet & Forget cleaner for showers, Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray, FryAway Waste Cooking Oil Solidifier Powder, and OxiClean versatile stain remover.  Additionally, it highlights the introduction of Snug Plugs, a solution for loose outlets, and a veggie chopper for meal preparation.

articles.title: 5 ChatGPT Prompts To Make Money With AI
articles.author: Sarah Hernholm
articles.summary: The article discusses how to use ChatGPT to generate income by creating service-based side hustles, digital products, personalized services, freelance or consulting offers, and marketing skills. It suggests actionable prompts to help entrepreneurs and freelancers identify opportunities, develop products, and secure clients, emphasizing that AI adoption is accelerating and early adopters are reaping the benefits.

articles.title: "38 pumps of dried lotion": Jergens new line of portable product immediately compared to "lotion crust"
articles.author: Ljeonida Mulabazi
articles.summary: Jergens has launched 'Lotion Bursts,' a new product featuring single-application lotion packs in heart shapes and two scents: lavender and cherry almond. The product is currently available online and is receiving mixed reactions, with some praising its concept and others criticizing its design.

articles.title: Revolutionize Your Data Storage: Explore the Cutting-Edge 1TB Dual-Sided Flash Drive as a Robust Alternative to Cloud Solutions
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: A new 1TB dual-sided flash drive offers a portable and high-capacity alternative to cloud storage. It features dual connectivity with USB-A and USB-C, fast data transfer via USB 3.2, and enhanced data privacy and security.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs. Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: I compared both Androids, and here's the winner
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Google has introduced the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a new book-style foldable phone featuring an IP68 rating for dust resistance. This new phone also supports MagSafe-compatible accessories, making it a good option for those switching from an iPhone.

articles.title: I tested these viral 'crush-proof' Bluetooth speakers, and they're not your average portables
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Turtlebox has released the Original Gen 3 Bluetooth speaker, retailing for $430. The speaker features a boombox-style form factor, 25 hours of playtime, IP67 water and dustproof rating, and reverse USB-C charging. Although some critics dislike the bass response, it makes for a great outdoor soundscape.

articles.title: DraftKings Promo Code: Claim $200 MLB, Tour Championship Bonus
articles.author: Wtop
articles.summary: DraftKings is offering a promo code to attract and engage users with their services.

articles.title: Google pulls the curtain back on its Pixel 10 family
articles.author: Steve Vegvari
articles.summary: Google unveiled its new Pixel 10 devices, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL. These devices feature notable upgrades compared to the previous year's models.

articles.title: Emily DiDonato's Dry Scalp Fix Is Surprisingly $16 on Amazon
articles.author: Kaitlin Marks
articles.summary: Emily DiDonato promotes Nizoral Anti-Dandruff Shampoo for dry scalp relief, highlighting its effectiveness after trying other remedies. Nizoral's key ingredient, ketoconazole, calms itch and flakes while being gentle for regular use, addressing the root cause of dandruff.

articles.title: Emily DiDonato's Solution for Dry Scalp Relief Is a $16 Soothing Shampoo: ‘Changed my Life'
articles.author: Us Weekly
articles.summary: Emily DiDonato endorses Nizoral Anti-Dandruff Shampoo for dry scalp relief, highlighting its key ingredient, ketoconazole, which calms itch and flakes. Nizoral targets the root cause of dandruff by calming inflammation and reducing buildup, and is available for $16 at Amazon.

articles.title: Pixel Fold Gets Key Upgrade: Samsung, Take Note!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable smartphone with an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance. The device features a redesigned hinge mechanism and a larger 5,010mAh battery. Google has also integrated PixelSnap, magnetic adapters similar to Apple's MagSafe, for accessories.

articles.title: A 7-figure Amazon seller shares 2 overlooked strategies that give him an edge
articles.author: Kathleen Elkins
articles.summary: Alex Yale launched Uncle Todd's cleaning brand on Amazon in 2023, featuring products like septic pods and floor cleaner. He also acquired Flip-It! Cap and is expanding into retail stores like Walmart, Home Depot, and Piggly Wiggly, leveraging distinctive packaging and an Amazon-to-retail strategy.

articles.title: 打个广告,版主手下留情。给关注创业社区Product Hunt的同学们
articles.summary: A developer created a daily video summarizing Product Hunt launches into audio highlights for easy listening. The project aims to help people discover new tools and provides makers with an extra channel of exposure.

articles.title: Haier presents L'art du lavage
articles.summary: HAIER Philippines launched its newest washing machine line at an event called 'L'art du lavage — The Art of Washing'. The event showcased new models like the Haier HW140-BD14387GNU1 with Direct Drive motor, Wi-Fi, AI wash and Essence Wash 2.0, the Haier HW120-BPD14367S8U1 with BLDC motor and AI wash, and the Haier HS120-BR1BU with Double Drive technology and Fresh Air function.

articles.title: From Saatva to Tempur-Pedic, here are the best Labor Day mattress sales to shop
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Several mattress companies, including Saatva, Leesa, Avocado, Tuft & Needle, Nectar, DreamCloud, Mattress Firm, Awara, Tempur-Pedic, Helix, Purple, and Casper, are offering significant Labor Day sales on their mattresses. Discounts range from up to 20% to 72% off select models, such as the Saatva Classic, Leesa Legend Hybrid, and Tempur-ActiveBreeze Smart Bed. Many deals include additional perks like free delivery, extended trial periods, and bundled bedding.

articles.title: Is Pixel 9 Pro XL Still Relevant? An Ode To One Of The Best Androids I Have Used In 2025
articles.author: Deep Majumdar
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 9 Pro XL, featuring a 6.8-inch display, a triple camera setup (50MP+50MP+50MP), and Google's Tensor G4 chipset. The smartphone includes AI features like Gemini Pro and offers 8K video recording. The newer Pixel 10 series is also launched, which includes upgraded configurations compared to Pixel 9 Pro XL.

articles.title: 25 Lightweight And Comfy Pairs Of Shoes
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: New Balance introduced 608 V5 Cross Trainers which are lightweight and comfortable. Dr. Scholl's launched Time Off Sneakers made with water-resistant faux leather and recycled material. Adidas' Cloudfoam cushioning sneakers gained popularity, and Teva launched midform sandals. Additionally, Fila released chunky platform sneakers to provide height without sacrificing comfort. Dr. Martens introduced platform sandals. Sketchers launched slip-ons.

articles.title: I'm a die-hard iPhone fan, but these 5 things from the Pixel 10 launch made me jealous
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10, highlighting its new AI features like Magic Cue, an AI smartphone assistant. The launch suggests Google is positioning itself strongly in the AI era of smartphones, focusing on features rather than specs. This launch prompts a reflection on what Apple might need to address in its upcoming iPhone 17.

articles.title: Hands on: I tried the new MSI Claw A8 at Gamescom 2025 and AMD's Z2 Extreme chip was nothing but an extreme let down
articles.author: Jasmine Mannan
articles.summary: MSI is releasing the MSI Claw A8 Z2 Extreme, a new gaming PC handheld featuring the AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme chip. The device has been slowly released in different regions, but its performance at Gamescom 2025 was mediocre, not delivering the expected performance boost compared to the AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme.

articles.title: A 7-figure Amazon seller shares 2 overlooked strategies that give him an edge
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Alex Yale founded Uncle Todd's and launched a cleaning brand on Amazon in 2023. Uncle Todd's products are now available in over 3,000 retail stores and is now a seven-figure business.

articles.title: The Framework Desktop and Linux have shown me the path to PC gaming in the living room
articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
articles.summary: The Framework Desktop, combined with the Bazzite Linux distribution (an open-source take on SteamOS), creates a powerful and user-friendly PC gaming experience for the living room. The Framework Desktop starts at $1,099, or $1,999 for the AI Max+ 395 version with 16 CPU cores, 40 graphics cores, and 128GB of RAM. It offers 4K/60fps gaming, and can be easily moved room to room.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs. Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: I compared both Androids, ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung and Google have introduced new foldable phones designed for different user needs. The article aims to help users determine which brand's phone best suits their individual requirements.

articles.title: 33 Products With Stunning Before-And-Afters That Say Everything You Need To Know
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new beauty and cleaning products. Lumify Eye Drops effectively reduces redness, while Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream hydrates and tightens skin. E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara extends lashes without smudging, and Mixsoon's Bean Essence exfoliates and hydrates skin. These products offer affordable alternatives to existing popular products.

articles.title: The Most Enjoyable Way to Browse Through Old Photographs
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Google introduced the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, featuring an IP68 ingress rating and a new gearless hinge design, and the Pixel Watch 4, designed for easier repair and battery replacement. Samsung launched the Galaxy Buds 3 FE with a stemmed design and longer battery life at a lower price point. Other new products include the Nanoleaf 4D V2 immersive TV lighting kit, Insta360's Go Ultra action camera with a larger sensor, and Sony's InZone Mouse-A, a lightweight wireless gaming mouse.

articles.title: 'Great' Ninja Blender that's ideal for shakes, frozen cocktails and smoothies
articles.author: Rachael Davies
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the Ninja Blast Max Portable Blender at a reduced price of £61.30. The blender features a more powerful motor, three blending functions, and a longer-lasting battery, providing up to 25 blends per charge. Customer reviews indicate satisfaction with its performance and ease of use for making fruit drinks and smoothies.

articles.title: HSBC cuts ties with Middle East clients to reduce risk: report
articles.author: Staff reporter
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch its new product, mini Labubu, this week. The company expects revenue to exceed 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: Exclusive Win-back Offers Now Available for Auto-Renewable Subscriptions: Unlocking Customer Retention Opportunities
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Archyde and other subscription management platforms now facilitate targeted win-back offers for lapsed subscribers. These offers include discounted re-subscriptions, free trial extensions with premium features, personalized onboarding, exclusive content, partial refunds, and bundled offers. The platforms use personalized email sequences to re-engage churned subscribers and provide incentives for them to return.

articles.title: Unlock a Competitive Edge with an Affordable Multi-AI Platform for Just $80
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Ouyi acquired '阿水AI' and now offers Ouyi 7.0 to existing members. However, the latest model, Ouyi 8.0, is not compatible. Multi-AI platforms provide features like AI writing assistants, image/video creation tools, chatbots, data analytics, and code generation.

articles.title: These Result Photos Will Motivate You To Clean Your Home
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content introduces a range of cleaning products, including stain-removing pads, scratch removers, shower sprays, mold removers, cleaning pastes, fabric defuzzers, restorative wipes, glass cleaners, pet hair removers, screen-cleaning brushes, exterior sprays, microwave steam cleaners, carpet cleaners, spin mops, stainless steel cleaners, pumice stones, drill brush attachments, dishwasher cleaning tablets, baseboard buddies, pet hair brooms, washing machine cleaning tablets, cooktop cleaners, grill grate cleaners, instant stain removers, grout cleaners, Magic Erasers, all-purpose cleaners, and drain clog removers, each designed for specific cleaning tasks around the house.

articles.title: Sprouts Farmers Market to Host Woodbridge Job Fairs; Seeks 107 New Employees
articles.author: TONY GALLOTTO
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market announced the opening of its fifth New Jersey store in Woodbridge on October 3rd. The grand opening event will include a ribbon-cutting ceremony, free reusable bags with samples for the first shoppers, long-stem rose bouquets, pop-up parties with contests and scavenger hunts, and free in-store samples.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs. Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Android Phone Comparison and Verdict on the Winner
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable smartphone with an industry-first IP68 dust resistance rating, set to be available on October 9th. Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7, already available, features a slimmer and lighter design, minimized crease visibility, and benefits from the established Galaxy AI suite. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold is priced $200 less than the Galaxy Z Fold 7.

articles.title: Binning The Bots With Richpanel To Transform Customer Service
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Richpanel asserts its customer service platform provides Amazon-style service standards. This platform targets all e-commerce merchants, promising a specific level of service quality.

articles.title: HK bowling team bowled over by cheers at National Games Finals
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch a mini Labubu this week. The company expects revenue to surpass 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: Building business beyond the puff: Transitioning to a smoke-free future
articles.author: Tina Arceo-Dumlao
articles.summary: Japan Tobacco Inc. (JTI) launched its Nordic Spirit nicotine pouches in the Philippines in mid-2023. The Philippines is the first Asian country to receive the product, which comes in special packs tailored to the local market and has seen positive consumer feedback. JTI is expanding production to serve new markets, including the Philippines.

articles.title: Woman arrested after stabbing Wong Tai Sin restaurant staff in the Abdomen
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch a mini Labubu product this week. The company anticipates its revenue will surpass 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: Paneer Butter Masala In Minutes: Indian Dish Cooked By Robot Impresses Netizens
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: A new kitchen robot is demonstrated to cook paneer butter masala and tofu curry. The robot offers options to choose servings and view ingredients, guiding users on ingredient placement and cooking processes. The cooking pans are made of tri-ply stainless steel and coated with a 100% PFOA-free non-stick finish by Swiss manufacturer ILAG. The robot takes about 30 minutes to cook the dish.

articles.title: TCL NXTpaper 11 Gen 2 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: TCL officially announced the NXTpaper 11 Gen 2 tablet in the third quarter of 2025. The tablet features a 10.95-inch NXTPAPER display, MediaTek MT8786 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, and an 8000 mAh battery with 18W charging. It operates on Android 15 and includes an 8-megapixel rear camera and a 5-megapixel front camera.

articles.title: Fans go wild as Marks and Spencer make major Colin the Caterpillar announcement
articles.author: Maria Leticia Gomes
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is launching a new ice cream version of its popular Colin the Caterpillar cake. This frozen take on the classic treat, complete with chocolate beans, has generated enthusiastic reactions online. The company has applied to trademark the frozen Colin cake.

articles.title: I was skeptical about the ROG Xbox Ally, but this one feature has me excited
articles.author: Tony Polanco
articles.summary: Asus is launching the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X handheld consoles, featuring a simplified Windows 11 interface and optimized performance via AI upscaling with the Z2 Extreme model. The ROG Xbox Ally boots directly into an Xbox UI with quick settings and a multitasking viewer.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Which one is slimmer, ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold globally. The new foldable smartphone features a slimmer design and the Tensor G5 chip, alongside durability improvements.

articles.title: I tested dupes for iconic cleaning product loved by Mrs Hinch – the £1.50 winner got rid of shower limescale instantly
articles.author: Consumer reporter
articles.summary: Stardrops introduced The Pink Stuff Miracle Cleaning Paste, priced at £1.50, which is effective on various surfaces. Astonish offers The Original Cleaning Paste, costing £1, for tough stain removal. Scrub Daddy provides Power Paste All Purpose Cleaner at £7.99, made from natural materials, while Biomex presents Miracle Cleaning Paste at £11.99 for effective cleaning. Elbow Grease has a Cleaning Paste, priced at £1.20, suitable for fabrics and stainless steel.

articles.title: Lidl's £1.99 buy is just like the big brand but £25 cheaper
articles.author: Emma Gill
articles.summary: Lidl has launched a new 'Deluxe' range of shower gels, including scents like Dizzy Rose, Mintilicious, and Relax, that are remarkably similar to Lush's products. Priced at £1.99 for 500ml, they are significantly cheaper than Lush's shower gels, which cost £27 for a similar-sized bottle.

articles.title: 2024 Cybertruck Price & Release: US (Aug 2025)
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Tesla's Cybertruck, with models priced from $81,985 to $101,985, has begun initial deliveries, influencing the electric truck market. The Cybertruck Cyberbeast accelerates 0-60 mph in 2.6 seconds and delivers 845 horsepower and redefines expectations and it achieves 334 miles on a single charge.

articles.title: Paparazzi Photo leverages AI to redefine event memories
articles.author: Azanis Shahila Aman
articles.summary: Paparazzi Photo Booth has launched an AI-enabled photo booth service, attracting interest from weddings, corporate functions, and lifestyle organizers. The company also plans to introduce more products including the magazine booth, LED mirror photo booth and 360 drone booth.

articles.title: 10 Tasty Kitchen Items You'll Use *So Much*
articles.author: Harry Levin
articles.summary: Various companies are offering new kitchen products to make food preparation easier. These include a rapid egg cooker, an air fryer with temperature control up to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, a mini rice cooker with a non-stick coating, a cutlery set, a box grater, a French press and frother, a nonstick toaster oven baking set, a mini muffin pan with a nonstick coating, travel snack cups with a spoon holder, and a wire skimmer.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 review: my favourite smartphone to test this year so far
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone featuring a more compact design, improved camera, and enhanced software. The device boasts an 8-inch inner display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, 200MP primary lens and runs on One UI 8 with Android 16, and is available for €2,149 with 256GB storage.

articles.title: New Look's 'comfortable' faux suede boots perfect for autumn
articles.summary: New Look has introduced its Dark Brown Faux Suede Pull On Boots, priced at £55.99 and available in UK sizes 3 to 8. The boots are described as stylishly casual with a low block heel and are part of New Look's Comfort range. Other new options added to New Look's website include the Black Chunky Sole Sock Fit Ankle Boots and the Dark Brown Faux Leather Heeled Knee High Boots.

articles.title: Home Bargains £4.99 blender is perfect for small spaces
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains is selling a rechargeable portable blender from the brand X-Tone for £4.99. Salter offers the Kuro NutriPro 1000 Multi-Purpose Blender for £42.99, reduced from £69.99.

articles.title: Zeekr 7X makes its debut in Malaysia: The fully-electric SUV that's set to challenge the Tesla Model Y
articles.author: Alexander Wong
articles.summary: Zeekr has launched the Zeekr 7X in Malaysia, marking its first 800V EV offering. The electric SUV is available in three variants with prices ranging from RM179,800 to RM226,800, and it includes a 22kW Wallbox charger and Solar Film as part of an exclusive launch offer.

articles.title: I tried Huawei's Mate XT, the world's first tri-fold smartphone
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Huawei has introduced the Mate XT, the world's first tri-fold smartphone, featuring a unique design with multiple unfolding segments and a 10.2-inch inner screen. The device is powered by the Kirin 9010 processor and boasts 16GB of RAM and 1TB of storage, but it runs on HarmonyOS and lacks Google Mobile Services.

articles.title: LookFantastic fans pick up 'game changer' powder foundation as seasons shift
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: bareMinerals has launched its ORIGINAL Pressed Powder Foundation SPF15, now available on LookFantastic for £36.50. The powder foundation, offering 30 shades, is receiving positive reviews for its blendability, coverage, and suitability for dry skin, with some comparing it favorably to Kylie Jenner's powder foundation.

articles.title: Why I'm Glad Samsung Phones Come With So Much Bloat
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring a thinner and lighter design. It boasts an 8-inch display, on-device Galaxy AI, 12GB RAM, 256GB Storage, 4,400mAh Battery, One UI 8, and connectivity features like 5G, LTE, Wi-Fi 7, and Bluetooth 5.4.

articles.title: Amazon fabric shaver that ‘freshens up jumpers nicely' helps bring clothes back to life
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: Vasson has launched the Vasson Fabric Shaver on Amazon, featuring a dual-head design and rechargeable battery. This product removes lint and fuzz from clothing and fabrics, reviving knitwear and upholstery.

articles.title: Discover Undisclosed Features of the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 You Need to Explore
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 introduces new features such as customizable video previews on the Flex Window, enabling users to interact with videos directly from the cover screen. It also includes advanced camera controls, allowing users to adjust settings like ISO and shutter speed. Additionally, Flex Mode has been enhanced with optimized app layouts and a floating taskbar for improved multitasking.

articles.title: The best smartwatch, buds and set-top box not made by tech giants
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Nothing has released Ear Open, open-ear buds priced at $250. Fetch offers the Mini G5 streaming set-top box for $160, which is a 4K HDR capable device, offering access to free-to-air TV and streaming apps.

articles.title: 'I tried a Hoover spot cleaner and it got a coffee stain out of my carpet'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Hoover released the HS5 Spot Wash & Dry, a stain remover designed for carpets, upholstery, cars, and glass. It is available for purchase from Hoover, Amazon, and Currys. The product features heated water and suction to remove stains, and includes multiple attachments and a detergent.

articles.title: OPPO Tablet: Battery & OS Details Leaked!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Oppo is developing a new tablet, launching in early 2026, focused on battery life and cross-platform user experience with ColorOS 16 based on Android 16. A more compact tablet may be released under the OnePlus brand as a budget-friendly alternative. The new Oppo tablet could feature interoperability with iPhones.

articles.title: In the United States: what is the price of the new Pixel 10 in 2025, the telephone with Google
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 lineup, featuring three models: Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL, with prices starting at $799. The lineup includes the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, Google's first foldable phone with IP68 certification. The Pixel 10 series is powered by Gemini Nano AI, enhancing Google apps and introducing features like Magic Cue and real-time translation, alongside a new AI-powered camera system.

articles.title: Belgian Waffles Debuted At The 1964 New York's World's Fair. They Were Introduced As Bel-Gem Waffles!
articles.author: South Florida Reporter.com
articles.summary: In 1953, Frank Dorsa's Eggo Frozen Waffles were introduced to supermarkets. In 1955, Joe Rogers and Tom Forkner opened the first Waffle House restaurant.

articles.title: vivo V60: ZEISS Lens redefining the midrange smartphone
articles.author: Saudi Gazette
articles.summary: vivo has unveiled the vivo V60 smartphone. It is a blend of innovation and refined design targeting the mid-range smartphone segment.

articles.title: Bet365 Bonus Code WTOP365: Claim Upgraded $200 Bonus for MLB, WNBA Sunday
articles.author: Wtop
articles.summary: bet365 introduces a new bonus code WTOP365 on its app, offering new users a choice between two different welcome offers. This code provides users with the opportunity to select their preferred welcome bonus when creating a new account.
